definition: slide examination/microscopic examination of thin section of specimen as part of biopsy
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: Computed tomography-guided biopsy confirmed the diagnosis of synovial sarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 经过电脑断层导引的切片检查，确定诊断为滑膜肉瘤。

sentences.english: Conclusion It is necessary to give frozen section examination in parotidectomy .
sentences.chinese: 结论实施腮腺手术时，术中行冰冻切片检查是必要的。

sentences.english: Colonoscopic biopsy is a prerequisite for correct diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 大肠镜切片检查是正确诊断的必要条件。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
biopsy/abbr. to 活檢|活检[huo2 jian3]
pinyin: huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2

definition: chemical examination/to do a lab test
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
